```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
fx <- expression(x ^ 2)
df_dx <- D(expr = fx, 'x')
df_dx
x <- 3
eval(expr = df_dx)

Pa <- expression(2 * (((3 * a) + 2) ^ 4) - 5)
dP_da <- D(expr = Pa, 'a')
dP_da
a <- 1.2
eval(expr = dP_da)

gt <- expression((-4 * t) / (((t ^ 2) + 1)  ^ 3))
dg_dt <- D(expr = gt, 't')
dg_dt
t <- 0
eval(expr = dg_dt)
```
